thread.title: Trump adviser hails 'new political order' - BBC News
thread.title_full: Trump adviser hails 'new political order' - BBC News

title: Trump adviser hails 'new political order' - BBC News
text:
Trump adviser hails 'new political order' 23 February 2017 Close share panel Image copyright Getty Images Stephen Bannon, chief strategist to President Donald Trump, has said that his election victory has ushered in a "new political order". 
He vowed at a conservative conference to bring together those of "wide and sometimes divergent opinions" in support of "economic nationalism". 
"We are a nation with a culture and a reason for being," the normally behind-the-scenes adviser told the audience. 
He said the president was "maniacally focused" on pursuing his agenda.
